TO AMEND BANK OF THE U.S. BILL, BY ADDING A NEW SECTION PROVIDING THAT IF, AT ANY TIME, THE U.S. SHALL CEASE TO HOLD STOCK IN THIS BANK THE POWER OF THE PRESIDENT TO APPOINT FIVE DIRECTORS AND THE TERM OF OFFICE OF THOSE ALREADY APPOINTED BY HIM SHALL CESE AND THERE SHALL BE AN ABRIDGEMENT OF SUCH POWER FOR EVERY $1,400,000 WORTH OF STOCK PARTED WITH BY THE U.S
TO POSTPONE CONSIDERATION OF BANK OF THE U.S. BILL, TO FIRST MONDAY IN DECEMBER.  (P. 274)
